float  value,
InterpMethod  interpolationMethod = HSL_INTERPOLATION

Interpolates color between neighboring colors of a colormap.

Parameters:
colormapThe colormap, a vector of colors.
valueThe desired color in the range [0.0, 1.0].
interpolationMethodThe interpolation method, HSL_INTERPOLATION or RGB_INTERPOLATION.
Returns:
The resulting color in RGB.

float Colormap::interpolate ( float  value,
float  f0,
float  f1,
float  x0,
float  x1 
)

Linear interpolation.

| f1 |-----------------* | . | | . | ? |---------X | | . | | f0 |---* | | |.__|_____|_______|____. x0 value x1

Note:
x0 has to be smaller than x1
Parameters:
valueValue between x0 and x1
f0,f1Function values at supporting points.
x0,x1Supporting points.
Returns:
Interpolated function value.

float  low,
float  high 
)

Clamps value to [low..high].

Parameters:
valueThe value to be clamped.
lowThe lower limit.
highThe upper limit.
Returns:
The clamped value.
